name: Finding You!
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2021     :       Finding You!

They´re  joined together by their friendship :D

You have a lasso. It will show you the way to your friend.

Its a game with a small history, where you have to find your friend. But, try to dont get damaged. That could change history.

There are 3 different endings. Try to get them all!

Made By:

Birch wood slab (Tim Duda) = Game History

Neyserlot (Brianna Bell) = 2D Drawings

AlxoProgramming(Alejandro Martínez) = Programming

Music page: W.O.W sound.
